description:
After some time of thinking about it, I decided to try 3D modeling even though I was never an artistic person. I took a Udemy course in Solidworks and after some time of playing and modeling with it, I decided to buy the Ender 3. I build an enclosure for it, replaced the nozzle with an all-metal swizz nozzle, and the heating bed. The printer now prints PETG, ABS, and practically every material out there.
The second picture here is one of my first prints. It is Gandalf's Staff From lord of the ring printed with wood fabric PLA and I add LED lights with a control button.
